message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent starting point.
Let's meet in the middle, no need to be greedy
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's reach an agreement before the inflation eats away at our gains.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still need a decent share to make this worthwhile
I'm willing to concede more, but I need to ensure a significant share for myself.  Let's work together to find a solution before the inflation makes this deal pointless.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not willing to give away the farm
We're running out of time.  I'm willing to give you a larger share, but we need to reach an agreement soon or we'll both lose out to inflation.

This is my final offer. We need to find a compromise quickly, or the inflation will leave us with nothing.
I'm taking a big risk, but I think I deserve most of the money
We're down to the wire. Let's split the money evenly. It's better than both of us getting nothing!
